game.name: Island of Hearts
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: After a rough breakup, you do what any reasonable person would: run away to a remote tropical island full of beautiful strangers. There, you’ll meet six captivating women, each with her own charm, secrets, and questionable taste in men. Your choices decide who you love, lose, or accidentally ghost.
